```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

load data

```{r}
data <- read.csv("../data/QFISH_data_v2.csv", header = T, na.strings = "")
```

clean up data. variables: year, species group, location, value
```{r}
data1 <- data[c(-1,-2,-28),c(-13,-26,-40,-54,-55)]

clean_data <- data1 %>% pivot_longer(cols = 2:50, names_to = c("SpeciesGroup","Area"), values_to = "Catch", names_pattern = "(.+)_(.+)", values_drop_na = T) 
```
